mapper.insert: insert into t_device(f_cmdId, f_devId, f_devNo, f_type, f_version, f_stationNo, f_md5) values (#{cmdId}, #{devId}, #{devNo}, #{type}, #{version}, #{stationNo}, #{md5})
insert into t_device_ext(f_device_md5, f_var_list, f_var_list_md5) values (#{deviceMd5}, #{varList}, #{varListMd5})
mapper.select: select count(1) as total from t_device_ext where f_var_list_md5 = #{varListMd5}
